Secure your checks with Frencheck

Since our creation in 2015, we aim to develop the European market and mentalities around background check. We are the reference for all verifications in France and in French-speaking countries.

Get in Touch

Check future employees in 48h

Our main control based on :

  • Employment History and Academic Education Verification
  • Media and Political Exposure
  • Criminal Record Checks
  • Reference and Director Background Checks

Why EveryCheck ?

1. SECURITY & SAFETY

We implement secure protocols for all our data

2. RAPIDITY & QUALITY

We offer audits in less than 48 hours

3. CONTROLS ARE PROCEED

By humans in France and artificial intelligence

4. PBSA ACCREDITATION

We can help you make the best possible recruitment decisions.

Why you should work with us to perform your checks in French

Full Legal Compliance & Data Protection

The EveryCheck solution complies with all European laws & GDPR guidelines. The processed information is stored on servers in France.

Customer Care: One of our Core Value

The team is always available to assist the users of the solution and give information.

Technological Innovation

Our SaaS solution is at the edge of technology and combines the latest innovations. The EveryCheck solution can be interfaced with all ATS.

Full Accuracy thanks to Human Checks & AI

Our in-house team, based in France is entirely dedicated to verifications.

Excellent Candidate Experience

We offer a very user-friendly interface for the candidate. It takes less than 5 minutes to complete the form.

Speed and Reactivity for Your Checks:

The verification reports are available in 48H. We immediately contact our users inform them of any major irregularity in the checks.

Compliance with regulations in Europe

We are compliant with all european data protection laws

Checks are performed by a french team
